QuestData.Title: The Vortex Pinnacle
QuestData.Description: One of our civilian leaders was taken prisoner by the air elementals.$B$BThey are probably torturing him for information as we speak.$B$BGo to the Vortex Pinnacle, where these foul creatures came from, and look for Itesh.$B$BYou will find the entrance to the Vortex Pinnacle hovering off of the southeastern coast of Uldum.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Itesh inside the Vortex Pinnacle.
QuestData.RewardText: You actually came here looking for me?
